00082 void Micropolis::doDisasters()
00083 {
00084     /* Chance of disasters at lev 0 1 2 */
00085     static const short DisChance[3] = {
00086         10 * 48, // Game level 0
00087         5 * 48,  // Game level 1
00088         60 // Game level 2
00089     };
00090     assert(LEVEL_COUNT == LENGTH_OF(DisChance));
00091 
00092     if (floodCount) {
00093         floodCount--;
00094     }
00095 
00096     if (disasterEvent != SC_NONE) {
00097         scenarioDisaster();
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (!enableDisasters) { // Disasters have been disabled
00101         return;
00102     }
00103 
00104     int x = gameLevel;
00105     if (x > LEVEL_LAST) {
00106         x = LEVEL_EASY;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (!getRandom(DisChance[x])) {
00110         switch (getRandom(8)) {
00111             case 0:
00112             case 1:
00113                 setFire();  // 2/9 chance a fire breaks out
00114                 break;
00115 
00116             case 2:
00117             case 3:
00118                 makeFlood(); // 2/9 chance for a flood
00119                 break;
00120 
00121             case 4:
00122                 // 1/9 chance nothing happens (was airplane crash,
00123                 // which EA removed after 9/11, and requested it be
00124                 // removed from this code)
00125                 break;
00126 
00127             case 5:
00128                 makeTornado(); // 1/9 chance tornado
00129                 break;
00130 
00131             case 6:
00132                 makeEarthquake(); // 1/9 chance earthquake
00133                 break;
00134 
00135             case 7:
00136             case 8:
00137                 // 2/9 chance a scary monster arrives in a dirty town
00138                 if (pollutionAverage > /* 80 */ 60) {
00139                     makeMonster();
00140                 }
00141                 break;
00142         }
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00148 void Micropolis::scenarioDisaster()
00149 {
00150     switch (disasterEvent) {
00151         case SC_DULLSVILLE:
00152             break;
00153 
00154         case SC_SAN_FRANCISCO:
00155             if (disasterWait == 1) {
00156                 makeEarthquake();
00157             }
00158             break;
00159 
00160         case SC_HAMBURG:
00161             if (disasterWait % 10 == 0) {
00162                 makeFireBombs();
00163             }
00164             break;
00165 
00166         case SC_BERN:
00167             break;
00168 
00169         case SC_TOKYO:
00170             if (disasterWait == 1) {
00171                 makeMonster();
00172             }
00173             break;
00174 
00175         case SC_DETROIT:
00176             break;
00177 
00178         case SC_BOSTON:
00179             if (disasterWait == 1) {
00180                 makeMeltdown();
00181             }
00182             break;
00183 
00184         case SC_RIO:
00185             if ((disasterWait % 24) == 0) {
00186                 makeFlood();
00187             }
00188             break;
00189 
00190         default:
00191             NOT_REACHED();
00192             break; // Never used
00193     }
00194 
00195     if (disasterWait > 0) {
00196         disasterWait--;
00197     } else {
00198         disasterEvent = SC_NONE;
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00207 void Micropolis::makeMeltdown()
00208 {
00209     short x, y;
00210 
00211     for (x = 0; x < (WORLD_W - 1); x++) {
00212         for (y = 0; y < (WORLD_H - 1); y++) {
00213             if ((map[x][y] & LOMASK) == NUCLEAR) {
00214                 doMeltdown(Position(x, y));
00215                 return;
00216             }
00217         }
00218     }
00219 }
00220 
00221 
00223 void Micropolis::fireBomb()
00224 {
00225     int crashX = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00226     int crashY = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00227     makeExplosion(crashX, crashY);
00228     sendMessage(MESSAGE_FIREBOMBING, crashX, crashY, true, true);
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00233 void Micropolis::makeFireBombs()
00234 {
00235     int count = 2 + (getRandom16() & 1);
00236 
00237     while (count > 0) {
00238         fireBomb();
00239         count--;
00240     }
00241 
00242     // TODO: Schedule periodic fire bombs over time, every few ticks.
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00247 void Micropolis::makeEarthquake()
00248 {
00249     short x, y, z;
00250 
00251     int strength = getRandom(700) + 300; // strength/duration of the earthquake
00252 
00253     doEarthquake(strength);
00254 
00255     sendMessage(MESSAGE_EARTHQUAKE, cityCenterX, cityCenterY, true);
00256 
00257     for (z = 0; z < strength; z++)  {
00258         x = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00259         y = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00260 
00261         if (vulnerable(map[x][y])) {
00262 
00263             if ((z & 0x3) != 0) { // 3 of 4 times reduce to rubble
00264                 map[x][y] = randomRubble();
00265             } else {
00266                 // 1 of 4 times start fire
00267                 map[x][y] = randomFire();
00268             }
00269         }
00270     }
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00275 void Micropolis::setFire()
00276 {
00277     short x, y, z;
00278 
00279     x = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00280     y = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00281     z = map[x][y];
00282 
00283     if ((z & ZONEBIT) == 0) {
00284         z = z & LOMASK;
00285         if (z > LHTHR && z < LASTZONE) {
00286             map[x][y] = randomFire();
00287             sendMessage(MESSAGE_FIRE_REPORTED, x, y, true);
00288         }
00289     }
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00294 void Micropolis::makeFire()
00295 {
00296     short t, x, y, z;
00297 
00298     for (t = 0; t < 40; t++)  {
00299         x = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00300         y = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00301         z = map[x][y];
00302 
00303         if ((!(z & ZONEBIT)) && (z & BURNBIT)) {
00304             z = z & LOMASK;
00305             if ((z > 21) && (z < LASTZONE)) {
00306                 map[x][y] = randomFire();
00307                 sendMessage(MESSAGE_FIRE_REPORTED, x, y);
00308                 return;
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00320 bool Micropolis::vulnerable(int tem)
00321 {
00322     int tem2 = tem & LOMASK;
00323 
00324     if (tem2 < RESBASE || tem2 > LASTZONE || (tem & ZONEBIT)) {
00325         return false;
00326     }
00327 
00328     return true;
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00336 void Micropolis::makeFlood()
00337 {
00338     static const short Dx[4] = {  0,  1,  0,  -1 };
00339     static const short Dy[4] = { -1,  0,  1,   0 };
00340     short xx, yy, c;
00341     short z, t, x, y;
00342 
00343     for (z = 0; z < 300; z++) {
00344         x = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00345         y = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00346         c = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00347 
00348         if (c > CHANNEL && c <= WATER_HIGH) { /* if riveredge  */
00349             for (t = 0; t < 4; t++) {
00350                 xx = x + Dx[t];
00351                 yy = y + Dy[t];
00352                 if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00353                     c = map[xx][yy];
00354 
00355                     /* tile is floodable */
00356                     if (c == DIRT
00357                           || (c & (BULLBIT | BURNBIT)) == (BULLBIT | BURNBIT)) {
00358                         map[xx][yy] = FLOOD;
00359                         floodCount = 30;
00360                         sendMessage(MESSAGE_FLOODING_REPORTED, xx, yy, true);
00361                         return;
00362                     }
00363                 }
00364             }
00365         }
00366     }
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00375 void Micropolis::doFlood(const Position& pos)
00376 {
00377     static const short Dx[4] = {  0,  1,  0, -1 };
00378     static const short Dy[4] = { -1,  0,  1,  0 };
00379 
00380     if (floodCount > 0) {
00381         // Flood is not over yet
00382         for (int z = 0; z < 4; z++) {
00383             if ((getRandom16() & 7) == 0) { // 12.5% chance
00384                 int xx = pos.posX + Dx[z];
00385                 int yy = pos.posY + Dy[z];
00386                 if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00387                     MapValue c = map[xx][yy];
00388                     MapTile t = c & LOMASK;
00389 
00390                     if ((c & BURNBIT) == BURNBIT || c == DIRT
00391                                             || (t >= WOODS5 && t < FLOOD)) {
00392                         if ((c & ZONEBIT) == ZONEBIT) {
00393                             fireZone(Position(xx, yy), c);
00394                         }
00395                         map[xx][yy] = FLOOD + getRandom(2);
00396                     }
00397                 }
00398             }
00399          }
00400     } else {
00401         if ((getRandom16() & 15) == 0) { // 1/16 chance
00402             map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = DIRT;
00403         }
00404     }
00405 }
